title: The American Deep State: Wall Street, Big Oil, and the Attack on
description:
The American Deep State: Wall Street, Big Oil, and the Attack on U.S. Democracy--Peter Dale Scott 2014

This provocative book makes a compelling case for a hidden â€œdeep stateâ€ that influences and often opposes official U.S. policies. Prominent political analyst Peter Dale Scott begins by tracing Americaâ€™s increasing militarization, restrictions on constitutional onal rights, and income disparity since the Vietnam War. He argues that a significant role in this historic reversal was the intervention of a series of structural deep events, ranging from the assassination of President Kennedy to 9/11
